text: The 1980 Vuelta a España was the 35th edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in La Manga, with a prologue individual time trial on 22 April, and Stage 10 occurred on 2 May with a stage to Santander. The race finished in Madrid on 11 May. ==Prologue== 22 April 1980 — La Manga to La Manga, (ITT) {| |Prologue result and general classification after Prologue {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank !
